lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. has successfully sought reforms in several of the institutions and was pressing for reforms in others aimed at making them more efficient, with policies oriented toward free markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Baker told a House appropriations subcommittee the administration's request for a total 2.1 billion dlrs in fiscal 1987 and 1988 would meet administration shortfalls and fulfill Washington's annual payment responsibilities.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Treasury Secretary James Baker urged Congress to support the administration's financing requests for the multilateral development banks in the next two fiscal years.
